title: Add Attachment struct and update Tick data structure
description:
Add Attachment struct to internal/tick/tick.go and update Tick struct.

## Changes

1. Add Attachment struct:
```go
type Attachment struct {
    ID          string    `json:"id"`
    Key         string    `json:"key"`
    Filename    string    `json:"filename"`
    Description string    `json:"description,omitempty"`
    ContentType string    `json:"content_type"`
    Size        int64     `json:"size"`
    URL         string    `json:"url"`
    UploadedAt  time.Time `json:"uploaded_at"`
    UploadedBy  string    `json:"uploaded_by"`
}
```

2. Add to Tick struct:
```go
Attachments []Attachment `json:"attachments,omitempty"`
```

3. Add helper methods:
- `func (t *Tick) AddAttachment(a Attachment)`
- `func (t *Tick) RemoveAttachment(id string) bool`
- `func (t *Tick) GetAttachment(id string) *Attachment`
- `func (t *Tick) HasAttachments() bool`

4. Add attachment ID generator (4-char, similar to tick ID)

## Testing
- Unit tests for add/remove/get attachment methods
- Verify JSON serialization with attachments
- Verify backward compatibility (ticks without attachments still load)
